name: diagnosis_impotence
description: A failure of a body part for which the diagnosis, and frequently the treatment, require medical expertise.

name: treatment_impotence_type
description: Type of treatment for impotence (surgical, nonsurgical)

name: procedure_penile_prosthesis_implantation
description: Surgical implantation of a penile prosthesis for impotence treatment

name: patient_hospital_inpatient_flag
description: Indicates if the patient is a hospital inpatient

name: mental_condition_present_flag
description: Indicates if treatment for impotence is furnished in connection with a mental condition

name: psychiatric_service_limitation_applies_flag
description: Flag indicating if psychiatric service limitations apply for treatment connected to a mental condition
